thread.section_title: Toptal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Toptal | toptal.com
thread.title: Dr Clive Hohberger
thread.title_full: Toptal reviewed by Dr Clive Hohberger

author: Dr Clive Hohberger
title: Dr Clive Hohberger
text:
I am a Scientific Consultant who is a Subject Matter Expert in barcode design. To support development of a custom barcode technology for a client, I contacted Toptal for C++ programming of the barcode technology, and development of Windows-based graphic demo programs.
Toptal Manager Pedro Alves Nogueira rapidly understood that I was looking for the highest level of programming and technical support, and assigned to me Dr Sasa Mrvos in Zagreb. Sasa not only understands and quickly delivers what I want programmed, but also understands the engineering and mathematical basis of what I am doing. He went on to provide me a C++ barcode decoding package which will save my client thousands of dollars in software licensing fees. Through Toptal I have found a R&D colleague as well as a superb programming support.
